title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6057.6 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6057.6 - Fees

State Regulations

The division shall charge a fee to an authorized internet
entity for a subscription to access sex offender internet identifiers as
follows: (a) If the authorized
internet entity has less than five million registered users the fee shall be
$100 per month. (b) If the
authorized internet entity has at least five million registered users but less
than 15 million registered users the fee shall be $500 per month. (c) If the authorized internet entity has at
least 15 million registered users but less than 30 million registered users the
fee shall be $1,000 per month. (d) If the authorized internet entity has 30 million or more registered users the
fee shall be $2,000 per month. In its discretion, the division may fully or partially
waive the fee when an authorized internet entity demonstrates that the fee
would be unreasonably burdensome. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6057.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
